```{r}
data("airquality")
dim(airquality)

sapply(airquality,class)

is.na(head(airquality,5))
which(is.na(head(airquality,5)))

newdata=airquality
for(i in 1:ncol(newdata))
  newdata[is.na(newdata[,i]),i]=mean(newdata[,i],na.rm=TRUE)

newdt=na.omit(airquality)
head(airquality,5)
head(newdata,5)
head(newdt,5)
```
